name: 克里斯托弗·休伦
name_full: 克里斯托弗·休伦 Christopher Huron

last_movies.title: 麦克斯与史莱德 第一季
罗莎琳德·雷最后的遗嘱

introduction: hristopher Huron is a Canadian actor and mascot enthusiast. He began his acting career in the suburbs of Burlington Ontario working in several community theatre productions usually cast as the supportive friend or comedic sidekick. After graduating from the joint program between the theatre studies program at the University of Toronto and and acting program at Sheridan College Christopher moved to Toronto to focus more on film work. He soon made his way to the small screen landing roles on Queer as Folk, Degrassi: The Next Generation, How To Be Indie amongst others. Known for his comedic timing and physical presence from several years working as various mascot characters, he has been able to transform these skills into diverse roles from friendly mascots in television shows like The Stanley Dynamic to scary creatures like the armless man in Silent Hill: Revelation 3D. He continues to work tirelessly to make his presence known in Toronto as a strong professional actor.
